name: spark
author: oh-my-fish
full_description:
### spark [Oh My Fish!][omf] package for [spark]. [![MIT License][license-badge]](/LICENSE)
Spark is a simple and awesome utility for printing sparklines in your shell. See the [spark] page for an overview and guide on how to use it. ## Install ```fish $ omf install spark ``` ## License This plugin is © Oh My Fish! under the [MIT][mit] license. Includes [spark] as a submodule, which is © [Zach Holman](http://zachholman.com). See the [spark license][spark-license] for details. [license-badge]: https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-007EC7.svg?style=flat-square [mit]: http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT [omf]: https://github.com/oh-my-fish/oh-my-fish [spark]: https://github.com/holman/spark [spark-license]: https://github.com/holman/spark/blob/master/LICENSE.md
